definition: to depend ultimately on (Tw)/absolutely reliant on
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: What we can talk about depends on how well we know a person.
sentences.chinese: 到底能談些什麼，端賴我們跟一個人交情有多深。

sentences.english: Bologna's real estate and restaurant industry depends on the students.
sentences.chinese: 波倫亞的房地產和餐飲業端賴學生。

sentences.english: Success depends upon one's perseverance and diligence.
sentences.chinese: 成功端賴一個人的堅忍與勤勉。

sentences.english: The success of the program requires that the locations of the courses be accessible to the club members.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃的成功與否端賴開課的地點是否靠近社員。
